column1: # This file controls what gets shared via upload_to_server/
# Edit this file to customize which outputs are shared with collaborators.
# - source_path: Relative path from subproject root (supports glob patterns)
# - include: "yes" to include, "no" or comment out to exclude
# NOTE: workflow-RUN_* patterns automatically resolve to the latest RUN directory.
# If RUN_01 and RUN_02 both exist, only RUN_02 outputs will be linked.
# Final project phyloname mapping with user overrides applied (script 004 output)
# Base species mapping before user overrides (script 003 output)
# USER ADDITIONS (add your custom paths below)
